Quest for a Test

There is no accurate diagnostic test for Lyme disease. A wrong or delayed diagnosis can make symptoms worse and harder to treat.

You can Change that

Diagnosis Dilema

Many patients go undiagnosed far too long, causing chronic disabilities.

0
More than 55% of current diagnostic testing in early Lyme is inaccurate.
0
Lyme makes up 90% of all reported cases of vector-borne illness.
0
More than 20% of patients treated for early stage Lyme disease continue to have symptoms.
Learn more
